main event: A red, green, and orange flashing light was observed through the clouds by 107 CASU personnel at Cape Thompson, Alaska in 1955.
interesting points: Similar sightings were reported by other reliable observers in the area.
The report mentions the possibility that the sighting could have been related to activities of a U.S. Coast and Geodetic Survey craft operating in the area.
The sighting was documented as part of Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program to investigate UFO reports.
sighted object: Red, green, and orange flashing light
photographs: Yes, the report indicates 2 photographs were taken, but they are not included in the provided documents.
